ref: 10507 yuvátē ʻ yokes ʼ RV., yauti ʻ takes hold of ʼ AV. 2. ʻ *eats ʼ NTS 286 (sáṁ yuvátē ʻ eats ʼ RV.). [Cf. Wkh. yāw -- ʻ to eat ʼ IIFL ii 555. -- IEW 507 separates 1. i̯eu -- ʻ to mix in preparing food ʼ (e.g. āyuta -- ʻ mixed ʼ, āyavana -- n. ʻ spoon ʼ) from 2. i̯eu -- ʻ to bind ʼ; but cf. upayuṅktē ʻ eats ʼ ĀśvGr̥.: √yuj. -- √yu1]
